Text: The Itchy & Scratchy & Poochie Show:  In the episode, "The Itchy & Scratchy Show" attempts to regain viewers by introducing a new character named Poochie, whose voice is provided by Homer.

Text: The Itchy & Scratchy & Poochie Show:  The episode is largely self-referential and satirizes the world of television production, fans of "The Simpsons", and the series itself.
